snippet: As the trial of the bus driver, Ophadell Williams, continued, a woman whose seat assignment may have saved her testified, and prosecutors showed a video of the accident’s aftermath.
abstract: Passenger Truc Thanh Tran, whose seat may have saved her on an ill-fated World Wide Travel bus trip to the Mohegan Sun casino in Connecticut, testifies at the manslaughter trial of bus driver Ophadell Williams.
lead_paragraph: As the trial of the bus driver, Ophadell Williams, continued, a woman whose seat assignment may have saved her testified, and prosecutors showed a video of the accident’s aftermath.

headline.seo: Passenger Recounts Chaos of Casino Bus Crash on I-95
headline.main: Passenger Recounts Chaos of Fatal Bus Crash in Bronx
headline.print_headline: Passenger Recounts Chaos of Fatal Bus Crash in Bronx
